line.text: %Blob%: Leave it to an X-Man ta wanna talk when there's work ta be done. De-activate those bombs and then we can stand here and swap recipes all day long; otherwise we're all gonna find out who has the mutant power to breath water.
line.textb: %Blob%: C'mon, buddy. Whaddaya think you're doin'? Get busy and defuse those bombs or we're all gonna drown like rats!
